SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.search

Class FhirSearchExecutor

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.search.FhirSearchExecutor
public class FhirSearchExecutor extends Object
Executes FHIR search queries against a data source.

This executor uses SearchColumnBuilder to create filter columns from FHIR search criteria, then applies those filters to resource datasets from the data source.

See Also:
  • FHIR Search
  • SearchColumnBuilder

  • Method Details

    • withDefaultRegistry

      @Nonnull public static FhirSearchExecutor withDefaultRegistry(@Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext, @Nonnull DataSource dataSource)
      Creates an executor with the default bundled search parameter registry for FHIR R4.

      This method requires an R4 FhirContext and uses the bundled R4 search parameters from the HL7 FHIR specification.

      Parameters:
      fhirContext - the FHIR context (must be R4)
      dataSource - the data source
      Returns:
      a new executor with the default R4 registry
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the FhirContext is not R4

    • withRegistry

      @Nonnull public static FhirSearchExecutor withRegistry(@Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext, @Nonnull DataSource dataSource, @Nonnull SearchParameterRegistry registry)
      Creates an executor with an explicit registry.
      Parameters:
      fhirContext - the FHIR context
      dataSource - the data source
      registry - the search parameter registry
      Returns:
      a new executor

    • execute

      @Nonnull public Dataset<Row> execute(@Nonnull Enumerations.ResourceType resourceType, @Nonnull FhirSearch search)
      Executes a FHIR search query.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the resource type to search
      search - the search criteria
      Returns:
      a filtered dataset with the same schema as the original resource data
